breaking_changes.description: Potential breaking changes in middleware handling. Review middleware implementation, especially error handling middleware.
Introduced changes to how route parameters are handled. Review routes and parameter handling logic.
Small changes in default behavior. Review how body-parser options are configured.
Possible issues with specific content types. Review if any custom content types are defined.
Changes in how .env files are parsed. Review .env file structure and usage.
Significant changes in how environment variables are handled. Review environment variable loading and usage.
Significant changes in how nodemon monitors files. Review nodemon configuration and file watching behavior.

phases.name: Phase 1: Low-Risk Updates
phases.rollback_plan: Revert package.json and package-lock.json to previous state. Reinstall dependencies.

phases.name: Phase 2: Medium-Risk Updates
phases.rollback_plan: Revert package.json and package-lock.json to previous state. Reinstall dependencies. Restore previous versions of express and body-parser.

phases.name: Phase 3: High-Risk Updates
phases.rollback_plan: Revert package.json and package-lock.json to previous state. Reinstall dependencies. Restore previous versions of dotenv and nodemon. Revert any changes to .env file structure or nodemon configuration.
